captions.text:
"Improbable Reconstruction",
everybody stand up.

Bella, I'd like you
to step ahead, please.
You're dead.

We have here two detectives from
CSI: Brazil that will solve her death.

I'd like you to give me
a non-lethal object.
'Dentures. Binoculars. Apple'.

We have 'dentures, binoculars and apple',
and "Improbable Reconstruction" starts now.

- What a gruesome crime.
- I'm like, totally shocked.
My goodness, so young!

- Look!
- Dentures.
Dentures already yellow.

- This can only mean one thing.
- What?

- I know what happened!
- Great!

This woman is a grandmother's
granddaughter, of course.

- How are you my granddaughter?
- And she takes care of her grandmother.

- Let's have a bath... - She has to watch
out for everything her grandmother does.

Listen. Get down, get up,
dance can-can!

Turn the TV on, turn the radio on,
turn the radio off, give me the remote!
You're worthless!

- And then...
- They started to fight, obviously.
Exactly!

And when an old person
fights, she sneezes.

And when you don't use
denture adhesive...
It killed her instantly!

The grandmother left the scene
to leave no evidence, but she did.
I don't know what I'm doing here...

Good story. But how does a denture
go straight to someone's jugular?

- Good aiming. - But for a
good aim you must have good vision.

- You're right!
- Yes, because you hadn't seen this!

My God!
A pair of binoculars!

- I know what happened.
- What happened?

- This woman is a bird hunter.
- Of course.
I know a lot of bird-hunting girls!

And what do you need for
hunting birds? To have a dog!
Husky!
The dog was very old...
Right, a very old dog.

She liked the very small birds,
so she used binoculars!

- Look, Husky, the small one...
- And Husky always talked to her.
Do you see, Husky?

- Go!
- Husky would go...

And came back with nothing,
because he couldn't see very weel.
Get out!

Until she got tired of Husky's licks
and started to fight with him.

And Husky got sick
of all that, and bit her!
Right on the jugular!

But he was so old
that he didn't have teeth...
He had dentures!

And before he left, Husky
did something naughty!
Well, I think we can wrap this up.
Wait!

- Oh, no!
- Oh, yes!

How could it be?
An apple!

- That changes the story completely!
- I know what happened!
Good!
This woman is actually Snow White!
Of course, she's so white!

Living with seven dwarfs.
Let's see the seven dwarfs now.
Good! Next!
C'mon, lazy!

No! No spitting!
Next!

- He remembered them all, I
couldn't do that! - Me neither!
He deserves an applause!

- What about her?
- One day she is visited...
By the evil witch!
Who's knocking at my door?

But the evil witch was disguised
as a binoculars saleswoman!

- Hello!
- Hello!

I see you have dwarfs in here! Why don't you
buy some binoculars to see them better?

- She was a great saleswoman, that
was an infallible sales pitch! - Infallible!

Where are the dwarfs?
Oh! Found them!

- It really works! - Then,
Snow White offered her some tea.

- Would you like some tea?
- Yes, of course!

I'll ask Bambi to make it.
Bambi, tea!

Then, Bambi entered the story!
And he greeted every single dwarf!
Hi!
Fuckin' faggot...
Oh, faggot.

And when he looked at the witch,
he got stunned! His jaw dropped!

He realised that was the evil witch
disguised as a binoculars saleswoman!
Darling, hello?

Come here, you...
Get away fom me!
Not in my house, you'll make a mess!
Stop! Stop! Stop!

Trying to break the fight,
Snow White throws an apple...
Stop! Sorry!

The witch went very...
Wow, this is too fast!

- You want apples? - Then,
she throws an apple at her temple!

- The witch throws her dentures at her temple!
- Temple, temple!
Look, a dwarf!

The she...
She kicks every single dwarf!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.
Lampião! Lampião!
Wrong code!
